description.en:
Enchantress summons a cloud of [3/5/7] wisps that heal all allies up to 4 cells away.

For 11 seconds, allies heal 25 health every 1.5 seconds.
description.zh_CN:
魅惑魔女召唤一群共 [3/5/7] 个小精灵治疗周围最多 4 格内的所有友军。

友军每 1.5 秒恢复 25 生命值，持续 11 秒。

description.en:
Tiny picks up a random adjacent enemy, and launches it at the farthest enemy target.

At impact, the target deals [100/200/300] damage to all enemies 1 cell away and stuns them for [1.5/2/2.5] seconds.
description.zh_CN:
小小随机抓起一个毗邻的敌人，将其投向对最远的敌方目标。

击中时，目标对周围 1 格内的所有敌人造成 [100/200/300] 伤害，并使其眩晕 [1.5/2/2.5] 秒。

description.en:
PASSIVE: Troll Warlord rains blow after blow gaining [15/20/25]% bonus increased attack speed per stack.

If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.

This effect can only stack up to [6/9/12] times.
description.zh_CN:
被动：巨魔战将持续攻击时，每次获得 [15/20/25]% 攻击速度加成。

如果改变目标，则加成清零。

此效果最多只能叠加 [6/9/12] 次。

description.en: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon, gaining a ranged attack of 4 cells as well as [50/100/200]% bonus to damage and attack speed. Terrorblade also exchanges health values with another ally when this ability starts.
description.zh_CN: 恐怖利刃化身成威力巨大的恶魔，获得远程攻击 4 格的能力，以及 [50/100/200]% 的伤害与攻击速度加成。此技能开启时，恐怖利刃也与另一名友军交换生命值。

description.en:
PASSIVE: Every attack by Slark lowers his target's damage by [3/4/5] and attack speed by [3/5/7].

Slark's damage and attack speed is increased by the same amount drained from his target.
description.zh_CN:
被动：每次斯拉克攻击都使其目标造成的伤害减少 [3/4/5] ，攻击速度降低 [3/5/7]。

斯拉克造成的伤害和攻击速度等量增加。

description.en: PASSIVE: After landing from a leap, Slark disarms his target for 3 seconds.
Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies for [200/350/500] damage and reduces the damage their attacks deal by [25/40/55] for 6 seconds.
description.zh_CN: BREATHE FIRE ABILITY

description.en: UNLOCKED BY THE DRAGON ALLIANCE PASSIVE: At the beginning of combat Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his movement speed by 30% and granting him new powers. Green Dragon:\nAttacks deal [30/30/30] poison damage per second for [5/5/5] seconds. Red Dragon:\nIn addition to poisoning enemies, attacks damage all enemy units 1 cell away from the target for 50% damage. Blue Dragon:\nIn addition to poisoning enemies, attacks slows movement speed by -30% and attack speed by -30% to enemy units 1 cell away from the target for [3/3/3] seconds.
description.zh_CN:
龙骑士变身成为三种古龙形态之一，移动速度提升 30%，并获得新能力。

碧龙：\n攻击时造成每秒 [30/30/30] 毒性伤害，持续 [5/5/5] 秒。

赤龙：\n除了对敌人造成毒性伤害外，攻击时对目标周围 1 格内的所有敌方单位造成 50% 伤害。

苍龙：\n除了对敌人造成毒性伤害外，攻击时使目标 1 格内的敌方单位的移动速度降低 -30%，攻击速度降低 -30%，持续 [3/3/3] 秒。

description.en:
Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path for [150/250/350] damage.

Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
description.zh_CN:
变体精灵化为波浪向前涌动，对所经之地的敌方单位造成 [150/250/350] 伤害。

变体精灵在波浪形态时无懈可击。

description.en: UNLOCKED BY THE DRAGON ALLIANCE PASSIVE: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that deals [20/30/40] damage per second and slows the attack speed of any enemy that damages it for 2 seconds. The acid exudate also increases Viper's magic resistance by [30/50/70].
description.zh_CN: CORROSIVE SKIN ABILITY

description.en:
Viper's acidic venom slows an enemy unit's movement and attack speed by [-40/-60/-80]% while also dealing [150/250/350] poison damage over time.

The slowing effect fades over the duration of the poison.
description.zh_CN:
冥界亚龙的酸性毒液使敌方单位的移动和攻击速度降低 [-40/-60/-80]%，并持续造成 [150/250/350] 毒性伤害。

减速效果会在毒性持续时间内逐渐消退。

description.en: PASSIVE: Phantom Assassin has a 10% chance of delivering a devastating [300/450/600]% critical strike to enemy units.
description.zh_CN: 幻影刺客有 10% 几率对敌方单位造成毁灭性的 [300/450/600]% 暴击。

description.en:
Batrider throws sticky oil, coating the ground 2 cells away from point of impact.  The oil adds [20/40/80] damage per stack to Batrider's attacks, and slows the movement and attack speed of enemies by -5%.

Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage and slow percentages, up to 10 stacks.
description.zh_CN:
蝙蝠骑士扔出烧瓶，覆盖作用点周围 2 格内的地面，每次叠加会使其攻击造成 [20/40/80] 额外伤害，并使敌人的移动和攻击速度降低 -5%。

再次施加粘性燃油可继续提高伤害，增加降速百分比，最多叠加 10 次。

description.en:
Gyrocopter launches a missile strike, hitting all enemies up to 3 cells away from point of impact.

Two missiles arrive in succession, the first dealing [200/300/400] damage and 30% slow for 2 seconds; the final one deals [200/300/400] damage and 60% slow for 4 seconds.
description.zh_CN:
矮人直升机发射导弹，打击作用点周围最多 3 格内的所有敌方单位。

两枚导弹先后到达，第一枚造成 [200/300/400] 伤害和 30% 的减速，减速持续 2 秒；第二枚造成 [200/300/400] 伤害和 60% 的减速，减速持续 4 秒。

description.en:
Alchemist sprays high-pressure acid, affecting enemies up to 3 cells away from the target.

Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take [15/25/35] damage per second and have their armor reduced by [-5/-8/-11].
description.zh_CN:
炼金术士向目标周围最多 3 格内的敌人喷洒高压酸雾。

穿过受污染地带的敌方单位每秒受到 [15/25/35] 伤害，同时护甲值减少 [-5/-8/-11]。

description.en: The Keeper of the Light channels energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals [150/200/250] damage per second channeled.
description.zh_CN: 光之守卫积攒光的能量，积攒时间越长，威力越大。释放后，光波每秒造成 [150/200/250] 伤害。

description.en: UNLOCKED BY THE DRAGON ALLIANCE PASSIVE: Just before taking damage, Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm for 0.5 seconds.
description.zh_CN: PHASE SHIFT ABILITY

description.en: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way for [150/200/250] damage.
description.zh_CN: 帕克在直线方向发出一个魔法球，对途经的敌方单位造成 [150/200/250] 伤害。

description.en: Mirana fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, stunning her target for [3/5/7] seconds and dealing [400/800/1800] damage.
description.zh_CN: 米拉娜射出一支绝对精准的远程箭矢，眩晕目标 [3/5/7] 秒，并造成 [400/800/1800] 伤害。

description.en: Chaos Knight throws a mysterious bolt of energy that stuns an enemy unit for a random duration as well as dealing a random amount of damage.
description.zh_CN: 混沌骑士投掷一支神秘的能量箭，对一个敌方单位造成随机时间的眩晕和随机伤害。

description.en: Slardar reduces enemy armor by [-15/-30/-45] for 20 seconds.
description.zh_CN: 斯拉达使敌人的护甲值降低 [-15/-30/-45]，持续 20 秒。

description.en: Sniper takes aim at an enemy unit for 2 seconds, then fires a devastating shot that deals [1000/2000/3000] damage and mini-stuns the target.
description.zh_CN: 狙击手瞄准一个敌方单位 2 秒，然后发射一发毁灭性的子弹，对目标造成 [1000/2000/3000] 伤害及短暂眩晕。

description.en: Tinker fires a salvo of rockets at 3 random enemies dealing [250/350/450] damage on impact.
description.zh_CN: 修补匠对 3 名随机敌人齐射导弹，击中时造成 [250/350/450] 伤害。

description.en: Axe taunts enemy units 1 cell away, forcing them to attack him.  While Berserker’s Call is active, Axe gains [15/25/35] bonus armor.
description.zh_CN: 斧王嘲讽周围 1 格内的敌人，强迫他们攻击自己。当狂战士之吼生效时，斧王获得 [15/25/35] 额外护甲值。

description.en: Juggernaut spins with his blade, rendering him immune to magic and dealing [50/100/150] damage per second to enemy units 1 cell away for 5 seconds.
description.zh_CN: 主宰舞起剑刃，使自己对魔法免疫，并对周围 1 格内的敌方单位造成每秒 [50/100/150] 伤害，持续 5 秒。

description.en: Lich releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to [6/9/12] times, slowing their attack and movement speed by -65% for 2.5 seconds and dealing [200/300/400] damage each time it hits.
description.zh_CN: 巫妖释放一个霜冻之球，在附近敌方单位间弹跳最多 [6/9/12] 次，使其攻击和移动速度降低 -65%，持续 2.5 秒，并在每次击中时造成 [200/300/400] 伤害。

description.en: Witch Doctor throws a cask of paralyzing powder that bounces [5/7/9] times between enemy units, stunning and dealing [50/75/100] damage to those it hits.
description.zh_CN: 巫医抛出一个装满麻痹粉末的木桶，在敌方单位间弹跳 [5/7/9] 次，眩晕击中的敌人并造成 [50/75/100] 伤害。

description.en: Bounty Hunter hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing [300/500/700] damage and mini-stunning the target.
description.zh_CN: 赏金猎人向一个敌方单位掷出一枚致命的飞镖，对目标造成 [300/500/700] 伤害和短暂眩晕。

description.en:
Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, hitting enemies for [150/250/350] damage and stunning them for 2 seconds.
Applies a stack of Caustic Finale to all enemies hit.
description.zh_CN:
沙王钻入地面挖掘隧道前进，对敌人造成 [150/250/350] 伤害并使其眩晕 2 秒。

对击中的所有敌人施加腐尸毒。

腐尸毒

被动：每当沙王击中一名敌人，便会使其目标的攻击速度降低 3 秒。如果目标在腐尸毒生效前死亡，将会爆炸，对 1 格内的友军造成伤害。

description.en: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging all enemies up to 3 cells away for [200/300/400] damage.
description.zh_CN: 痛苦女王发出刺耳的尖叫，对周围最多 3 格内的所有敌人造成 [200/300/400] 伤害。

description.en: Ogre Magi incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed by [8/10/12]% and attack speed by [30/40/50]%. If cast on Ogre Magi himself, the attack speed bonus is [35/55/75]% instead.
description.zh_CN: 食人魔魔法师激起一个友方单位的狂暴，使其移动速度增加 [8/10/12]%，攻击速度增加 [30/40/50]%。如果对食人魔魔法师本人施加，攻击速度加成则为 [35/55/75]%。

description.en: The sharp edges of Timbersaw's suit of armor whirl about, damaging enemies up to 2 cells away for [150/200/250] damage.
description.zh_CN: 伐木机盔甲锋利的刃片飞旋，对周围最多 2 格内的敌人造成 [150/200/250] 伤害。

description.en:
Necrophos releases a wave of death around him affecting enemy and friendly units up to 3 cells away.

Death Pulse deals [100/150/200] damage to enemies and heals allies for [100/175/250].
description.zh_CN:
瘟疫法师在他周围释放死亡波动，波及周围最多 3 格内的敌方和友方单位。

死亡脉冲对敌人造成 [100/150/200] 伤害，并治疗友军 [100/175/250] 生命值。

description.en: Clockwerk discharges high-powered shrapnel at random enemy units 1 cell away for 5 seconds, dealing [50/75/100] magical damage and mini-stunning them.
description.zh_CN: 发条技师对周围 1 格内的随机敌方单位发射高能弹片，持续 5 秒，造成 [50/75/100] 魔法伤害及短暂眩晕。

description.en:
Templar Assassin becomes elusive, avoiding damage and gaining [40/60/80]% bonus to her damage.

The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have [4/6/8] instances each.
description.zh_CN:
圣堂刺客变得难以捉摸，躲避伤害并获得 [40/60/80]% 的伤害加成。

伤害攻击与伤害躲避效果相互独立，各有 [4/6/8] 次。

description.en: Enigma steeps an area in dark resonance, dealing [5/7/9]% of an enemy's max health for 10 seconds to all enemy units up to [2/3/4] cells away from the target.
description.zh_CN: 谜团将某个区域浸入黑暗共振中，对目标周围最多 [2/3/4] 格内的所有敌方单位造成其最大生命值 [5/7/9]% 的伤害，持续 10 秒。

description.en:
Any enemy unit up to 4 cells away looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed by 30%.

If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa, that unit will turn to stone.

Petrified units are stunned, and take bonus 20% physical damage.
description.zh_CN:
在周围最多 4 格内凝视美杜莎的任何敌方单位的移动与攻击速度降低 30%。

如果总凝视时间达到 2 秒，该单位将被石化。

石化的单位被眩晕，并承受额外 20% 的物理伤害。

description.en: PASSIVE: Medusa magically splits her shot into 3 arrows, hitting additional targets within 1 cell of her primary target. These arrows deal [-40/-30/-20] percent of her normal damage.

Treant Protector plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health by [60/90/120] every 1.5 seconds, while simultaneously slowing its attack and movement speed by -50%.

The seed heals friendly units up to 3 cells away from the target. Lasts 5 seconds.
description.zh_CN: 树精在一个敌方单位体内种下一颗吸血的种子，每 1.5 秒吸收其 [60/90/120] 生命值，同时使其攻击和移动速度降低 -50%。\n\n种子对目标周围最多 3 格内的友方单位进行治疗。持续 5 秒。

description.en:
Razor releases a ring of plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing up to [100/175/250] to damage to enemy units up to 3 cells away.

Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor.

The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once in each direction.
description.zh_CN:
剃刀释放出一圈等离子，威力随扩张程度而提升，在收缩时也会对周围最多 3 格内的敌方单位造成减速和最大 [100/175/250] 的伤害。

距离剃刀越远，伤害与减速越高。

等离子场对每个单位造成两次伤害，每个方向各一次。

description.en: Shadow Fiend channels the souls of the damned and unleashes demonic energy all around him, dealing [100/175/250] damage to anyone caught in the blast.
description.zh_CN: 影魔收集被诅咒的灵魂，并在其周围释放邪恶的能量，对受到爆炸冲击的所有人造成 [100/175/250] 伤害。

description.en: PASSIVE: The Anti-Mage burns [30/60/90] of the opponent's mana on each attack, dealing 50% of the mana burned as damage to the target.
description.zh_CN: 被动：敌法师每次攻击时燃烧对手的 [30/60/90] 魔法值，并对目标造成相当于燃烧魔法值 50% 的伤害。

description.en: PASSIVE: Drow Ranger adds a [10/20/30]% bonus to attack speed to all allies 1 cell away.
description.zh_CN: 被动：卓尔游侠使 1 格内的所有友军的攻击速度提升 [10/20/30]%。

description.en:
PASSIVE: Luna's glaives bounce between enemies 2 cells away.

Glaives deal 30% less damage with each bounce.
description.zh_CN:
被动：露娜的月刃在 2 格内的敌方单位之间弹跳。

月刃每次弹跳造成的伤害都会减少 30%。

description.en: Tidehunter slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, dealing [150/250/350] damage and stunning all enemy units [2/3/4] cells away for [2/2.5/3] seconds.
description.zh_CN: 潮汐猎人猛击地面，触手向各个方向穿出，对周围 [2/3/4] 格内的所有敌方单位造成 [150/250/350] 伤害，并使其眩晕 [2/2.5/3] 秒。

description.en: Tusk connects with his mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike so powerful it launches its victim into the air. Upon landing, the victim is slowed by 40%.
description.zh_CN: 巨牙海民打出强有力的海象神拳，把目标暴击到空中。目标落地后会减速 40%。

description.en: Omniknight instantly heals a friendly unit for [200/400/600] and damages all enemy units 1 cell away.
description.zh_CN: 全知骑士立即治疗一个友方单位 [200/400/600] 生命值，并对周围 1 格内的所有敌方单位造成伤害。

description.en:
Disruptor creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units up to 2 cells away from his target for [3/4/5] seconds.

The damage starts off weak, but ramps up in power until reaching its maximum damage of [100/150/200].
description.zh_CN:
干扰者制造一场破坏性的静态风暴，沉默目标周围最多 2 格内的所有敌方单位，持续 [3/4/5] 秒。

伤害刚开始时很弱，但会逐渐增强，直至达到最大 [100/150/200] 伤害。

description.en: Windranger charges her bow for up to 1.5 seconds for a single powerful shot, dealing up to [400/600/800] damage. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced by 10%.
description.zh_CN: 风行者为她的弓蓄力，射出一支强力箭矢，最长可蓄力 1.5 秒，造成最多 [400/600/800] 伤害。强力击每击中一名敌人，箭矢的伤害都会降低 10%。

description.en: PASSIVE: Every 2 seconds, Crystal Maiden grants [8/14/20] mana to all friendly units.
description.zh_CN: 被动：每 2 秒，冰晶圣女向所有友方单位提供附加的 [8/14/20] 魔法值恢复。

description.en:
Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units along their path for [60/100/140] damage.

Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster by [10/20/30]%.
description.zh_CN:
兽王把斧头投出去再召回，劈开沿途的敌方单位，造成 [60/100/140] 伤害。

每把斧头可以击中一名敌人一次，并使来自兽王的后续伤害增加 [10/20/30]%。

description.en:
Doom invokes a powerful curse that prevents an enemy from casting spells or using items, while also taking [60/90/120] damage per second.

Lasts 20 seconds.
description.zh_CN:
末日使者对敌人施加威力巨大的诅咒，使其无法施放法术或使用物品，同时每秒造成 [60/90/120] 伤害。

持续 20 秒。

description.en: Venomancer summons a Plague Ward to fight alongside him.
description.zh_CN: 剧毒术士召唤瘟疫守卫一起作战。

description.en: Lina unleashes a bolt of lightning, dealing [500/750/1000] damage to a single unit.
description.zh_CN: 莉娜放出一道闪电，对一个单位造成 [500/750/1000] 伤害。

description.en:
Abaddon protects a friendly unit with a shield that absorbs [100/300/500] damage for 10 seconds.

When the shield is destroyed it bursts and deals [100/300/500] damage to enemies up to 2 cells away.

Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.
description.zh_CN:
亚巴顿用护盾保护一个友方单位，护盾能吸收 [100/300/500] 伤害，持续 10 秒。

护盾被摧毁后会爆炸，对周围最多 2 格内的敌人造成 [100/300/500] 伤害。

施放时移除某些负面状态和眩晕。

description.en: Kunkka summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, dealing [150/250/350] damage and stunning all enemies up to [2/3/4] cells away from the wreckage for [1.4/1.7/2] seconds.
description.zh_CN: 昆卡召唤一艘幽灵船驶过战场，直到船被撞成粉碎，对残骸周围最多 [2/3/4] 格内的所有敌人造成 [150/250/350] 伤害，并使其眩晕 [1.4/1.7/2] 秒。

description.en: Shadow Shaman transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities for [4/6/8] seconds.
description.zh_CN: 暗影萨满将一个敌方单位变成人畜无害的生物，使其无法攻击和使用技能 [4/6/8] 秒。

description.en: Nature's Prophet summons a Treant from the edge of the board. This Treant is considered a druid.
description.zh_CN: 先知从棋盘边缘召唤一名树精。此树精被视为德鲁伊。

description.en: Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion.
description.zh_CN: 召唤一名威力巨大的熊灵伙伴。

description.en:
Lycan summons two wolves to fight alongside him.

Lycan then transforms and gains [30/40/50]% to his max health, his move speed is boosted to 650 and gains 40% chance to critically attack for [150/175/200]% bonus damage.
description.zh_CN:
狼人召唤两头狼一起并肩作战。

随后狼人可变身，最大生命值增加 [30/40/50]%，移动速度增至 650 并有 40% 几率进行暴击，造成 [150/175/200]% 额外伤害。

description.en:
The gang plants an explosive that detonates after 3 seconds and deals [700/1100/1500] damage to targets 4 cells away.

Does half-damage to enemies half the max distance away.
description.zh_CN:
这伙人放好炸弹，在 3 秒后引爆，对 4 格内的目标造成 [700/1100/1500] 伤害。

对影响范围中较远半程的敌人造成的伤害量减半。

description.en: PASSIVE: This unit's melee attacks strike nearby enemies.
description.zh_CN: 被动：此单位近战攻击附近的敌人。

description.en:
Pudge launches a bloody hook towards his farthest enemy, dragging the victim back and dealing [150/220/290] damage.

Pudge and allies 1 cell away will direct their attacks to the victim until it dies.
description.zh_CN:
帕吉向距离最远的一个敌人射出血腥的肉钩，将其钩到身边，并造成 [150/220/290] 伤害。

帕吉与周围 1 格内的友军对该敌人进行攻击，直至其死亡。

description.en: Warlock whispers an incantation, restoring [75/150/200] health to a friendly unit, or damaging an enemy unit for [100/150/200], every second for 6 seconds.
description.zh_CN: 术士低声说出一个咒语，每秒治疗一个友方单位 [75/150/200] 生命值，或每秒对一个敌方单位造成 [100/150/200] 伤害，持续 6 秒。

description.en:
PASSIVE: Every second Bloodseeker takes damage equal to 7% of his max health.

For every % of health missing, he gains 5% attack speed.

On a kill, he regains 35% of his max health.
description.zh_CN:
被动：血魔每秒受到的伤害相当于其最大生命值的 7%。

每损失百分之一的生命值，血魔获得 5% 的攻击速度加成。

击杀时恢复最大生命值的 35%。

description.en:
Arc Warden creates a copy of himself.

The duplicate can use all of Arc Warden's current items and spells and has separate cooldowns, but generates -50% mana from outgoing attacks, and no mana upon receiving damage.
description.zh_CN:
天穹守望者自我复制。

复制体可以使用天穹守望者当前的所有物品和法术，且冷却时间单独计算。攻击时产生 -50% 的魔法值，而受到伤害时不产生魔法值。

description.en: PASSIVE: Whenever Sand King hits an enemy he reduces his target's attack speed by -30 for 3 seconds.  If a target dies while Caustic Finale is active it will explode, dealing [45/90/180] damage to its allies 1 cell away.
PASSIVE: Black Dragon's ranged attack deals splash damage to units 1 cell away of the Dragon's target.
description.zh_CN: 被动：黑龙的远程攻击对其目标周围 1 格内的单位造成溅射伤害。
